mapper.select:
SELECT xt_generator_forbidtable.`xt_generator_forbidtable_id`, xt_generator_forbidtable.`xt_generator_forbidtable_table`, DATE_FORMAT(xt_generator_forbidtable.`xt_generator_forbidtable_ctime`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `xt_generator_forbidtable_ctime`, DATE_FORMAT(xt_generator_forbidtable.`xt_generator_forbidtable_mtime`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `xt_generator_forbidtable_mtime`, xt_generator_forbidtable.`xt_userinfo_id`, xt_generator_forbidtable.`xt_generator_forbidtable_remark`, xt_userinfo.`xt_userinfo_realName` FROM xt_generator_forbidtable xt_generator_forbidtable LEFT JOIN xt_userinfo AS xt_userinfo ON xt_generator_forbidtable.xt_userinfo_id = xt_userinfo.xt_userinfo_id WHERE 1=1
AND xt_generator_forbidtable.xt_generator_forbidtable_remark like '%${xt_generator_forbidtable_remark}%'
AND xt_generator_forbidtable.xt_generator_forbidtable_table like '%${xt_generator_forbidtable_table}%'

SELECT xt_generator_forbidtable.`xt_generator_forbidtable_id`, xt_generator_forbidtable.`xt_generator_forbidtable_table`, DATE_FORMAT(xt_generator_forbidtable.`xt_generator_forbidtable_ctime`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `xt_generator_forbidtable_ctime`, DATE_FORMAT(xt_generator_forbidtable.`xt_generator_forbidtable_mtime`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `xt_generator_forbidtable_mtime`, xt_generator_forbidtable.`xt_userinfo_id`, xt_generator_forbidtable.`xt_generator_forbidtable_remark`, xt_userinfo.`xt_userinfo_realName` FROM xt_generator_forbidtable xt_generator_forbidtable LEFT JOIN xt_userinfo AS xt_userinfo ON xt_generator_forbidtable.xt_userinfo_id = xt_userinfo.xt_userinfo_id WHERE xt_generator_forbidtable.xt_generator_forbidtable_id=#{xt_generator_forbidtable_id}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM xt_generator_forbidtable WHERE xt_generator_forbidtable_id IN
#{item}
